page.title: 16CARDROSS _ PASTIMES
page.content: { {ARTS AND CRAFTS -}NORMA IRVINE, A GIFTED POTTER, WORKS FROM HOME,AND, THROUGH THE SCOTTISH WOMEN'S RURAL INSTITUTE, THERE HAS BEEN A RENEWED INTEREST IN NEEDLEWORK AND CRAFTS RESULTING IN TWO "HOUSE CLASSES". { NEIGHBOURING ART CLASSES ARE POPULAR. {ENTERTAINMENT -}MANY ARE MEMBERS OF THE PARISH CHURCH CHOIR AND SOME HAVE JOINED MUSIC CLUBS IN LOCAL TOWNS. DANCES ARE HELD IN THE NEARBY GOLF CLUB FOR MEMBERS AND THEIR FRIENDS. VILLAGE CONCERTS ARE WELL- ATTENDED. {LIFE STYLES -}HOME ENTERTAINING IS POPULAR, THOUGH THE MORE AFFLUENT WILL "EAT OUT". MOST OF THE PRIVATE HOUSES HAVE GAS CENTRAL HEATING AND DOUBLE- GLAZING WHILE THE COUNCIL HOUSES RELY ON COAL, ELECTRIC OR GAS FIRES.
